entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • The LSIF generator should emit warnings if the binlog is skipping projects #68692
  • Outputting hover information consumes a huge amount of the LSIF indexing time #68691
  • The LSIF generator should allow for a per-document timeout #68690
  • Evaluating patterns fails with "Internal error in the C# compiler" #68689
  • Data Tips should work for properties in patterns #68688
  • [API proposal] Collection literals #68687
  • Simply opening .editorconfig file makes significant changes to the file for C# settings #68683
  • Prefer simple using statement setting not respected when "No" #68682

Closed

  • LSIF generator fails to start because it cannot find the .NET SDK - Near term fix #67383
  • Feature 'Navigation bar' is currently unavailable due to an internal error. #68672
  • Feature 'Semantic classification' is currently unavailable due to an internal error. #68679
  • Expected value of GetEnclosingSymbol for PrimaryConstructorBaseTypeSyntax #68661
    17.7

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2204488 #68686
  • Reduce allocations for LocalScopeBinder.BuildLocals #68684
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Service cleanup #68681
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Relax ref readonly parameter signature matching #68680
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Merge release/dev17.7 to main #68685
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2192664 #68422
  • Enable spell checking for Razor #68678
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Omit Slice call when start is 0 and 0 <= end <=length. #68660
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Initialize 'Flags' and 'DeclarationModifiers' in constructor of SourceMemberMethodSymbol #68347
    Area-Compilers, Concept-Design Debt, Next
  • Avoid `Span` creation when indexing into an inline array with a constant. #68642
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays

Updated

  • Remove the feature flag and change the default for open generated files #60976
    Area-IDE
  • Add ReportIVTs compiler mode #68665
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review
  • Generic interceptors #68602
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add ExternalAccess API for interceptors #68652
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Implement "extension invocation" section for methods #68629
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, C# 12.0
  • Add and emit ref kind for ref readonly parameters #68179
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, C# 12.0
  • Relax value checks for `ref readonly` parameters #68656
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Flesh out implementation of ref-safety rules for inline array operations. #68597
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Primary Constructors: Implement double storage warning for field initializers #68662
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Relax parameter-argument modifier matching for ref readonly parameters #68224
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, C# 12.0
  • Primary ctors #68477
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
